skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has an extra 10% chance of inflicting a critical hit. 

Each hit also has a 40% chance of increasing the duration of any [HP Burn] debuffs on the target by 1 turn.
skills.name: Exemplar of Rage
skills.books:

Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.desc:
Attacks 4 times at random. Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 3 turns before attacking. 

Each hit has an extra 10% chance of inflicting a critical hit. Each hit also has a 75% chance of instantly activating any [HP Burn] debuffs on each target and decreasing the duration of those [HP Burn] debuffs by 1 turn. 

Fills this Championâ€™s Turn Meter by 30% if 3 or more [HP Burn] debuffs are activated during the attack.
skills.name: Bloodshed Tempest
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. Has an extra 10% chance of inflicting a critical hit. Has a 75% chance of placing [HP Burn] and [Block Buffs] debuffs for 2 turns. 

Also places a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff on targets whose Turn Meter is higher than 50%.

skills.desc: Whenever this Champion receives a [Fear], [True Fear], [Freeze], [Provoke], [Sleep], [Stun], or [Petrification] debuff, instantly removes it. Then, fully heals this Champion, and grants an Extra Turn.
skills.name: Laugh At Danger [P]
